text: Vada is a town in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Rosignano Marittimo, province of Livorno. At the time of the 2011 census its population was 3,461. The town is about 25 km from Livorno and 8 km from Rosignano Marittimo. == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Livorno
title: Vada, Rosignano Marittimo
